SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AudioManager
This class manages audio playback, including background music and sound effects.
Avatar
Represents an avatar in the game, containing information such as name, image path, and description.
AvatarPanel
Represents a panel displaying an avatar's information, including an image, player name, character name, and number of remaining cards.
AvatarRadioButton
A customized radio button component that displays an image icon and provides visual feedback when selected.
BoardPanel
The main panel that represents the game board.
CardButton
An abstract class representing a card button.
Carta
Enum representing a playing card.
CustomFont
Utility class for loading custom fonts from external font files.
DownCardButton
A custom button for displaying facedown cards on the game board.
FaceUpCardButton
A custom button for displaying face-up cards on the game board.
FuturisticButton
A custom button with a futuristic appearance.
GiocaScreen
Represents the "Gioca" screen of the game, where players can select the game mode and start playing.
Giocatore
Represents a player in the card game.
GiocatoreController
This class manages the game actions and controls related to players.
JsonStatsController
This class manages reading and writing player statistics to a JSON file.
JTrash
The main class that starts and manages the Trash game.
MainView
The main graphical user interface of the JTrash game.
MazzoDiCarte
Represents a deck of playing cards.
MenuPanel
The main menu panel of the JTrash game.
ModalityRadioButton
A custom radio button used for selecting a game modality in the main menu.
PDFOpener
A utility class for opening PDF files using the default PDF viewer.
PescaController
ActionListener implementation for handling the draw action.
PescaScartiController
ActionListener implementation for handling the draw from discard pile) action.
PlayerPanel
A panel representing a player's game interface, including cards in hand and avatar.
ProfiloScreen
Represents the profile screen where users can customize their profile settings and view statistics.
ScambiaController
ActionListener implementation for handling the swap action.
ScartaController
ActionListener implementation for handling the discard action.
Seme
Represents the suits of playing cards.
StoriaScreen
Represents the story screen where users can read the background story of the game.
SwitchPageController
Controller class for switching between different screens in the game.
TrashGame
Represents the Trash Card Game.
Valore
Enumeration representing the values of playing cards.
